title: Aperture Watch Face (beta)
summary: The Android Wear watch face for geeky photographers.
description: Requires a Android Wear device.Shows aperture values on the watch face instead of the hours. The aperture opens and closes according to the time / aperture.I have only been able to test it on a Sony Mobile SmartWatch 3. If you find any issues on other devices then please send me a email and I will fix it ASAP.Photographs by Roger Madsen Photography. More watch faces with other photos is coming soon.
descriptionHTML:
Requires a Android Wear device.

Shows aperture values on the watch face instead of the hours. The aperture opens and closes according to the time / aperture.

I have only been able to test it on a Sony Mobile SmartWatch 3. If you find any issues on other devices then please send me a email and I will fix it ASAP.

Photographs by Roger Madsen Photography. More watch faces with other photos is coming soon.
comments: A well executed idea Works as described!
